titles: A proclamation, for rouping the rests of the hearth-money.
author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)
publisher: Printed by the heirs of Andrew Anderson, Printer to their most excellent Majesties,
notes: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Dated: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh, the twelfth day of July. And of Our Reign the sixth year, 1694.
Signed: Gilb. Eliot, Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
